org.ftab.database

Class Create

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ftab.database.Create

  • public class Create
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO for creating the database schema for the system

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String SQL01_CREATE_CLIENT

      SQL query to create an index on the message table by priority.
      private static java.lang.String SQL03_MSG_RECEIVER_IDX
      SQL query to create an index on the message table by receiver.
      private static java.lang.String SQL03_MSG_SENDER_IDX
      SQL query to create an index on the message table by sender.
      private static java.lang.String SQL03_MSG_TIME_IDX
      SQL query to create an index on the message table by create_time.
      private static java.lang.String SQL04_MSG_QUEUE_ASSOC_MSG_IDX
      SQL query to create an index on the msg_queue_assoc table by message id.
      private static java.lang.String SQL04_MSG_QUEUE_ASSOC_QUEUE_IDX
      SQL query to create an index on the msg_queue_assoc table by queue id.

    • Method Detail

      • createClientTable

        private void createClientTable(java.sql.Statement stmt)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Auxiliary function to add the creation of the client table to a batch statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - batch statement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query can't be added to the statement.

      • createQueueTable

        private void createQueueTable(java.sql.Statement stmt)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Auxiliary function to add the creation of the queue table to a batch statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - batch statement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query can't be added to the statement.

      • createMessageTable

        private void createMessageTable(java.sql.Statement stmt)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Auxiliary function to add the creation of the message table to a batch statement, it assumes that the queue and client table creation is already in the statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - batch statement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the queries can't be added to the statement.

      • execute

        public void execute(boolean client,
           boolean queue,
           boolean msg,
           java.sql.Connection conn)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create the requested tables in the database.
        Parameters:
        client - indicates if the client table should be created.
        queue - indicates if the queue table should be created.
        msg - indicates if the message table should be created, creating the message table implies creating the client and queue table.
        conn - database connection.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the table creation fails.
